ygData.subject: Re: Race war server.
ygData.msgSnippet: This sounds great,, but..... I d like to see an extra dimention added to it.  I d like to be able to petition the gm for a group switch, like an evil gnome
ygData.messageBody:
This sounds great,, but.....
I'd like to see an extra dimention added to it. I'd like to be able to
petition the gm for a group switch, like an evil gnome necro getting added
to the troll, dark elf and ogre team. I think that would be wonderful and
add a lot to the roleplay possibilities. It would allow you to be a spy or
traitor to your race, more fun stuff than just a strait race war. If anyone
has any input into that type of thing we should send it in to management.

Arathorne, Solsek Ro


>From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Subject: [warriors_eq] Race war server.
>Date: Thu, 17 Jun 1999 11:32:27 -0400
>
>From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
>Hey gang,
>
>I just thought id let you know that when the new race war sever comes up
>myself and a very good friend are starting a guild. For those of you who
>dont know the race war server is sort of like the PvP server Rallos Zek but
>you cant just walk up and kill anyone. The Races are divided into teams
>and
>only other teams can kill you. This is how the teams are made up so far:
>Trolls, Ogres, Dark Elves (Probably Lizard Men too when they get added)
>Barbarians, Humans, Erudites,
>Wood Elves, High Elves, Half Elves.
>Dwarves, Gnomes, Halflings.
>
>Now this is going to be way better than Rallos zek cause you wont have some
>person of your own race killing you. makes more sense this way.
>The guild we are going to start is going to be called The Dark and is only
>going to be made up of the team of Trolls, Ogres, and Dark Elves. This
>Guild
>will attempt to bring misery and pain to those who follow the light. Both
>my
>friend and i are roleplayers and enjoy the feeling of playing the bad guy.
>
>So right now i am asking you if anyone wants to join us when the new server
>comes out. We can always use Warriors, but we are also looking for other
>classes too they are: Shamans, Rogues, Enchanters, Clerics In particular. I
>am starting a Necro to be the Guild leader and My friend as Co leader will
>be a wizard. We would like to get as many people as possible and if you
>want
>to be a warrior thats fine! Heck thats GREAT! We just need people.
>
>If you want more info on our guild or want to inquire about joining email
>me
>at ZWANENJ@... during the week or zbitnew@... during the
>weekend.
>
>Thanks guys and i hope you all join me!
>
>Lothaniel/Rayne T'kazz
>

>that

> > experience. There may have been an undocumented fix in a patch since,
>but

> >

> >
> > Surtur

>for

> > case??
